import argparse
import re

def validate_email(email):
    """Validates an email address against a basic regular expression pattern."""
    pattern = r"^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$"
    return re.match(pattern, email) is not None

def process_emails(emails):
    """Processes a list of email addresses, validating each one."""
    valid_emails = []
    for email in emails:
        if validate_email(email):
            valid_emails.append(email)
    return valid_emails
